Entries.18/f George 1500/p George: sadpiano/17 17/farmer 10 19 1 George 18 17 0/skippable/emote George 12/speak George "Nnnnggghh....I just can't reach it!$u#$b#If only I could get up from this infernal chair...$s"/move farmer 4 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer 3 0 0/pause 500/showFrame 15/pause 500/pause 500/playSound Ship/pause 500/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection George 3/showFrame 35/pause 500/playSound coin/pause 300/stopAnimation farmer/pause 500/speak George "Thanks, {{Lowercase: {{Random: {{Hana.GNMTokens/ElderInformalNoun}} }} }}."/pause 800/speed George 1/faceDirection George 2/pause 500/move George 0 1 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak George "*sigh*...It happened 30 years ago.$s#$b#I was working in the coal mines. We were near the end of our shift, but there was one last seam that needed to be broken up.#$b#I went in there aiming to set off a stick of dynamite, but my foot slipped into a crack and I dropped it. The dynamite exploded on impact."/pause 800/speak George "The next thing I remember, I was laying in the hospital... and they told me I'd never walk again."/faceDirection George 3/speak George "So there you have it. You probably figured I was just too old to walk.#$b#Well I'll have you know that I'd be spryer than a spring chicken if I hadn't been in that accident!"/faceDirection George 2/speak George "..."/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 1700/speak George "You've been very nice to me, {{Lowercase: {{Random: {{Hana.GNMTokens/ElderInformalNoun}} }} }}. I appreciate that.#$b#When you're old, you start to forget that anyone cares about you."/pause 800/faceDirection George 3/pause 1000/end
Entries.56/f Harvey 500/p George: jaunty/16 18/farmer 9 24 0 George 16 18 1 Harvey 15 18 1/skippable/move farmer 0 -4 1/move farmer 1 0 1/speak Harvey "Okay, George. I want you take a deep breath for me."/pause 700/speak Harvey "Mmhmm... turn around, please."/pause 300/faceDirection George 2/faceDirection George 3/speak Harvey "George, I'll be honest with you. You need to make some changes in your lifestyle if you want to stay healthy.#$b#I'd like you to reduce your sodium intake, and try to get some moderate exercise with your arms."/emote George 12/speak George "Hmmph... I know what's best for me. Who do you think you are, telling me how to live my life?"/pause 500/speak Harvey "I'm your doctor, George. That's who I am...#$b#And I went to school for 8 years so I could learn how to help people stay healthy."/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 5 0 0/faceDirection Harvey 2 true/faceDirection George 2/speak Harvey "Oh!#$b#I'm sorry, but you shouldn't be here... these check-ups are supposed to be private."/faceDirection farmer 3/speak George "Not so fast! I'd like to get a second opinion from this young {{Lowercase: {{Random: {{Hana.GNMTokens/GenericNoun}} }} }}."/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Harvey "Very well..."/speak Harvey "$q 84 null#@, what do you think George should do?#$r 84 40 event_george1#George should follow Dr. Harvey's advice.#$r 85 -40 event_george2#George knows what's best for his own body."/faceDirection Harvey 1/faceDirection George 2/emote George 28/speak George "Fine. I'll do what you say, doctor."/pause 500/faceDirection Harvey 2/speak Harvey "$p 84#Thanks for your help, @. I appreciate it.$h|It's better not to give my patients mixed messages, @. Please remember that in the future."/end
Entries.5837189/n georgeGifts: jaunty/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 02 George 18 19 2 Evelyn 3 17 0/skippable/animate George false true 400 0 20/positionOffset George 0 -16/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 114 241 14 15 17 17/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 114 241 14 15 19.5 18.5/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 114 241 14 15 16.5 18/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 114 241 14 15 20 17/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 114 241 14 15 19 17/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 103 243 10 13 18.5 19.5/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 114 241 14 15 17.25 20.6/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 114 241 14 15 17 21/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 114 241 14 15 17.5 21/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 103 243 10 13 15 18/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors 288 1231 16 16 17 19 998/viewport 18 19 true/pause 5000/warp farmer 9 24/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -4 1/move farmer 4 0 1/stopAnimation George/faceDirection George 3/speak George "@? What's the meaning of all this...#$b#Is this some kind of prank?"/pause 500/quickQuestion #We wanted to show our appreciation#Your wife set this up#Yes, it's a prank(break)playMusic none\pause 1000\positionOffset George -4 0\playSound Cowboy_Footstep\pause 500\positionOffset George -4 0\playSound Cowboy_Footstep\pause 500\positionOffset George -4 0\playSound Cowboy_Footstep\pause 500\specificTemporarySprite georgeLeekGift\specificTemporarySprite removeSprite 998\playSound Ship\pause 800\showFrame George 21\playSound coin\playMusic echos\pause 1000\speak George "Leek... $s"\pause 1000\speak George "My favorite... Just like Mama used to make, so many years ago..."\pause 2000\showFrame George 0\faceDirection George 2\speak George "Hmmph. Well..."\emote George 40\showFrame George 16\pause 500\speak George "Well... That... Hmmph.#$b#I guess maybe I'm not as forgotten and ignored as I thought...$s"\faceDirection George 3\speak George "Thanks, {{Lowercase: {{Random: {{Hana.GNMTokens/ElderInformalNoun}} }} }}.$h#$b#You made an old man's day.$h"\pause 500\emote farmer 32(break)playMusic none\pause 300\jump George\pause 1000\speak George "Hah! She thought she could fool me!"\pause 500\faceDirection George 2\pause 400\showFrame George 16\pause 600\speak George "She thought she could fool me... into thinking I'm anything more than an inconvenience.$s"\stopAnimation George\faceDirection George 3\speak George "Well, I know better..."\pause 400\faceDirection George 1\speak George "Now, scram!$u"\emote farmer 28(break)playMusic none\pause 300\jump George\pause 1000\speak George "Hah! You're a prankster, then?"\emote George 40\playMusic playful\speak George "Hahah... You know, I was a bit of a prankster back in the day, too.$h"\faceDirection George 2\speak George "Well, at least you gave me a laugh.$h"\pause 2000\faceDirection George 3\emote George 8\speak George "What, you think I'm going to open them?"\jump George\pause 1000\speak George "Hah! Not a chance. You think I'd fall for the old 'exploding present' gag?"\faceDirection George 2\speak George "These are going straight into the trash!"\pause 300\faceDirection farmer 2 true\showFrame farmer 94\jump farmer/pause 2000/end

Changes.LogName: Fix Events JoshHouse - Modded Dialogue + Custom Pronouns - Plural
